price: N’iyo babwiwe bati “Nimwuname (musali)!” Ntabwo bunama (ngo basali).
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu ir'kaʿū lā yarkaʿūna
